item.title: Shoppers spend billions on Black Friday to snag holiday deals, despite wider economic uncertainty
item.description: Despite wider economic uncertainty hovering above this year’s holiday season, shoppers turned out in big numbers for Black Friday — spending billions ...

item.title: How major US stock indexes fared Friday, 11/28/2025
item.description: Wall Street rose for a fifth straight day to put the wraps on a volatile month

item.title: A Gambian-flagged tanker catches fire in Black Sea and crew is safe
item.description: A Gambian-flagged tanker has caught fire in the Black Sea off Turkey’s coast

item.title: Talks on UK access to an EU defense fund have broken down
item.description: Talks on the U.K. joining a major EU defense fund have ended without agreement, the British government said Friday

item.title: Eel populations are falling, and new protections were defeated. Japan and the US opposed them
item.description: Valuable eels are in decline all over the world, leading to a new push for restrictions on trade to try to help stave off extinction
